title: The 4 Percent Universe: Dark Matter, Dark Energy -epub
description:
The 4 Percent Universe: Dark Matter, Dark Energy, and the Race to Discover the Rest of Reality 

In the past few years, a handful of scientists have been racing to explain a disturbing aspect of our universe: only 4 percent of it consists of the matter that makes up you, me, our books, and every planet, star, and galaxy. The restÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½96 percent of the universeÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½is completely unknown.

This is perhaps the greatest mystery in all of science, and solving it will bring fame, funding, and certainly a Nobel Prize.  The stakes couldnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t be higher. Our view of the cosmos is profoundly wrong, and Copernicus was only the beginning: not just Earth, but all common matter is a marginal part of existence.
